高磁能积 / 高矫顽力 / 高稳定性
Dongguan JinconnNew Material Holdings Co., Ltd.
做中国磁铁行业标杆企业
金坤磁铁是一家集稀土永磁钕铁硼产品研发、生产和销售为一体的国家高新技术企业、广东省“专精特新”企业、国家专精特新重点“小巨人”企业。
国家高新技术企业
广东省“专精特新”企业
国家专精特新重点“小巨人”企业
工业应用
为客户带来真正的商业价值，成为助力客户市场发展的重要伙伴
磁铁广泛应用于汽车行业。 它们可以在ABS制动控制系统，自动离合器，电动窗机构，风挡雨刷电机，定向照明控制，座椅运动电机，自动停车设备，安全带使用检测，发电机，室内空间闭合中找到。
伴随科技的飞速发展，磁铁在以手机为代表的通讯类消费型电子产品中应用越来越广泛，手机里的受话器和扬声器所应用的磁铁也越来越精致，有单体、及配套的微型的异形片磁铁。其他消费电子产品中的磁铁也无处不在...如耳机，传感器，摄像机电机,平板电脑等，金坤可以提供设计和定制化的磁铁来满足客户的不同需求。
钕铁硼磁铁可以用来做工业自动化产品。工业磁体主要由磁体和金属，塑料等一些其他材料组成的组件，主要应用是各种电机，定子，转子，发电机，发动机，联轴器，升降机，分离器，过滤器，工具，电动车等。由于其自身的特点和性能，钕铁硼磁体主要用于电动机和发电机。
磁铁同样应用于许多电子电器和智能家居。 大部分的厨房电器都含有直流电机包括小小的电动牙刷。 大多数智能电器需要小型直流电机进行操作，此时小直流电机需要小型钕铁硼磁体。 小型磁铁也用于门锁，防火门，高级厨房门，智能窗帘等。
01.
新能源汽车领域
02.
消费电子领域
03.
工业电机领域
04.
智能家居领域
高瞻远瞩 碳想未来
稀土是国家的重要战略资源，在世界科技发展中起到了至关重要的作用。结合我国力争2030年前实现“碳达峰”和2060年前实现“碳中和”的远景规划，公司牢记“做中国磁铁行业标杆企业”的愿景...

本实用新型涉及无线充电技术领域，尤其公开了一种用于无线充电的磁铁组件，包括用于配合无线充电线圈的磁铁单元，磁铁单元包括承载片、设置于承载片的多个磁铁件，多个磁铁件围绕承载片的中心轴线呈环形阵列；沿承载片的中心轴线方向，磁铁件同一端的端面具有N极及S极；实际制造时，先将多个磁铁件安装设置在承载片，使得承载片与多个磁铁件组合形成独立的磁铁单元，然后即可将承载片安装在外界的充电基座上；拆卸时，仅需拆卸开承载片与充电基座即可；实现磁铁组件的快速安装或快速拆卸，大大提升磁铁组件的拆装效率。

High energy product, High coercive force, High stability
Dongguan JinconnNew Material Holdings Co., Ltd.
Be a benchmark enterprise in China’s magnet industry
Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co., Ltd is a national high-tech enterprise integrating the research and development, production and sales earth permanent NdFeB magnet products. It has obtained provincial certification of “Specialized and sophisticated enterprises that produce new and unique products” and national certification of “The Little Giant Company”.
National High-Tech Enterprise
Guangdong SpecializedRefined, and Innovative Enterprises
National LittleGiant Company
Industrial Application
Bring real commercial value to customers and become an important partner to help customers develop their markets
Magnets are widely used in the automotive industry. They can be found in ABS brake control systems, automatic clutches, electric window mechanism, windshield wiper motors, directional lighting controls, seat movement motors, automatic parking devices, seat belt detection, generators, interior space closures.
With the rapid development of science and technology, magnets are more and more widely used in communication consumer electronic products represented by mobile phones. The magnets used in receivers and speakers in mobile phones are becoming more and more refined. There are monomers and matching miniature magnets. Shaped sheet magnets. Magnets in other consumer electronic products are also ubiquitous...such as earphones, sensors, camera motors, tablet computers, etc. Jinconn can provide designed and customized magnets to meet the different needs of customers.
NdFeB magnets can be used for industrial automation products. Industrial magnets are mainly components composed of magnets and metals, plastics and other materials. The main applications are various motors, stators, rotors, generators, engines, couplings, elevators, separators, filters, tools, electric vehicles, etc... Due to its own characteristics and performance, NdFeB magnets are mainly used in motors and generators.
Magnets are also used in many electronic appliances and smart homes. Most kitchen appliances contain DC motors including small electric toothbrushes. Most smart appliances require small DC motors to operate, which in turn require small NdFeB magnets. Small magnets are also used in door locks, fire doors, high-end kitchen doors, smart curtains, etc.

Looking Ahead, Imagining The Future
Rare earth is an important strategic resource of China and plays a vital role in the development of science and technology in the world. In combination with the country‘s long term plan of striving to achieve “carbon peak” by 2030 and “carbon neutrality” by 2060, the company keeps in mind the vision of “becoming a benchmark enterprise in China’s magnet industry.

results.title: Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co.,LTD - IFA Berlin 2023
results.content: The main products are high-performance NdFeB permanent magnet material for high end 5G/3C consumer electronices, automotive electronics, smart home applications, permanent magnet motors, intelligent robots and other products in important fields.
results.raw_content:
​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​
Exhibitors
Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co.,LTD
Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co.,Ltd was established in 2011. It is a national high-tech enterprise integrating the research, development, production and sales of rare earth permanent NdFeB magnet products. Jinconn has obtained provincial certification of “Specialized and Sophisticated enterprise” and national certification of “ The Little Giant Company”.
The company adheres to the market orientation, focuses on rare earth permanent magnet and magnetic component products, establishes an industry-university-research cooperation base and an engineering technology center, and improves its rapid response capability and comprehensive market competitiveness. It has passed ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO27001, IATF16949, QC080000 and intellectual property management system certification, etc. The main products are high-performance NdFeB permanent magnet material for high end 5G/3C consumer electronices, automotive electronics, smart home applications, permanent magnet motors, intelligent robots and other products in important fields. Jinconn becomes a long-term and important permanent magnet material patner for well-known domestic and foreign customers.

Company Information
Dongguan Jinconn New Material Co.,Ltd
Jin Kun Magnet Co., Ltd. was established in October 2005. After 12 years of struggle for excellence, has now become a set of raw materials, research and development, production quality as one of the leading magnet enterprises.
The company has three factories: Jiangxi Ganzhou magnetic raw materials factory, specializing in the production of magnet raw materials; Anhui Jiangxin micro-power plant, specializing in the production of micro-motor for mobile phone camera; Dongguan Creek factory is set research and development Seiko as an integrated production base: plant planning office Area of about 1,800 square meters (single-family office), production workshop of about 5,600 square meters, staff quarters of about 2,400 square meters. The total staff of about 320 people. Existing slicing equipment for more than 500 Taiwan, with an annual capacity of 150 million square centimeters (250 tons contract).
There are more than 700 sets of equipments, such as inner circle cutting machine, drilling machine, line cutting machine, single-side grinding machine, double-sided grinding machine and vertical grinding machine, to meet the production requirements of various industries. The factory has a variety of reliability testing equipment such as salt spray machine, constant temperature and humidity, high temperature testing machine, magnetic properties analyzer, the second element projector, drop test equipment and other equipment to meet product demand.
Jin Kun magnet NdFeB magnets are widely used in medical, communications, electronic information, new energy vehicles, wind power, military and defense and other fields. The company has passed ISO9001, ISO14001, TS16949 international certification system.
Jin Kun magnet and Microsoft, TCL, Hisense, BYD, Foshan Lighting, SKULLCANDY, LITEON, Angshuo electro-acoustic communications, and other industries and enterprises are strategic partners!
Dongguan Jinkun Magnet Co., Ltd. relies on the industrial cluster advantages and technical superiority of the "World Manufacturing Capital (Dongguan)", continuously intensifies technological innovation and continuously improves the production technology and equipment of sintered NdFeB magnets, Quality and performance has been greatly improved to further enhance the market competitiveness of enterprises; Division I has accumulated a mature high-end products manufacturing and efficient customer service capabilities to 3 to 5 years to become the industry high-end, shaped, precision NdFeB Boron magnet the leader.
Trade & Market
Factory Information
Factory equipped with inner round cutting, automatic wire cut, drilling, wire cut, surface grinding, vertical grinding, centerless grinding and other machine capability.
Nowadays, we are one of the magnet manufacturing plant well equipped with manufacturing, test and validity, soft and hardware management system, and most advance equipment in use in Delta Pearl River area.
Factory capable to accept mostly all the odd shape customize magnet order base on market requirement

Similar Companies:
Jonway AutomobileChinan/aZhejiang Jonway Automobile Co., Ltd is the subsidiary of Jonway Group. Jonway Group manufactures automobiles, motorcycles, vehicle and motor parts, light building materials, air-compressors, plastics as well as other vehicle subcomponents. Zhejiang Jonway Automobile Co., Ltd began manufacturing in May, 2003. Located at the beautiful East China sea coast-port industry zone of Jiangtiao, Sanmen county. It has invested more than 600 million RMB in producing the three- and five-door SUVs, with a capacity to produce up to 30,000 units per year. The manufacturing operations include pressing, welding, painting and assembling lines. It has also gained the TS16949:2009, GCC, SASO, SONCAP and CCC certification. Jonway offers a network of more than 500 auto dealerships in China alone and has started a distribution network in Italy.
TomologicSwedenPrivateArtificial Intelligence is about to revolutionize the sheet metal industry. Tomologic joined the fourth industrial revolution by introducing Optimization Intelligence as a Service. You can now significantly reduce costs and increase processing throughput while preserving high product quality. Our optimization service can reduce manufacturers' material waste by up to 50%. Manufacturers achieve more efficient raw material utilization, lower power consumption as well as faster production processing. The bottom line: reduced material, production and operation costs.
EzytubeAustralian/aInnovative concrete forming technology developed by a Sydney company is revolutionising the Australian construction industry, and word is fast spreading offshore. Ezytube’s spiral tube technology is the world’s first truly waterproof paper-based construction tube. It is manufactured using existing spiral winding equipment without any extra set-up costs, and produces a tube which is significantly lighter and offers improved strength properties. Ezytube’s Managing Director Kevin Adams says the technology offers enormous advantages over alternative products currently used in the construction industry. “Ezytube is a lightweight, semi-rigid tube, comprising multiple layers of extremely strong plastic reinforcing mesh,” he said. “It is faster, easier, safer, and offers significant cost reductions? a team of two can put up 30 columns a day whether the columns are round, square or rectangular.”;Mr Adams said existing round formwork tubing traditionally used in Australian construction markets consisted of thick, heavy cardboard tubes that could not tolerate any exposure to rain without collapsing. Tubes were also made of heavy steel and plastic spirals, which were difficult to cut and remove after pouring. The sharp edges exposed by the cuts could also put workers at serious risk of injury. “Existing square and rectangular shaped columns are formed by skilled carpenters cutting form ply and reinforcing with timber beams,” he said. “These processes are labour intensive, slow to perform and require highly-skilled workers.”;He said the Ezytube technology addresses all of these problems. It offers significant occupational health and safety benefits, it fast tracks projects, and it offers significant reductions in both labour costs and skills requirements. In the case of traditional timber forming methods, using the Ezytube can bring staggering productivity gains of between 600 and 900 per cent. “Any company located in any country around the world which currently manufactures cardboard tubes for column forming purposes, using spiral paper tube winding equipment, can instantly start manufacturing our tubes upon licensing our technology and purchasing our Australian-made raw materials,” said Mr Adams.
WASPItalyPrivateWASP's ultimate goal is developing huge scale 3D printers to produce low-cost housing units. Operating as a non-profit, WASP develops and sells various sizes of delta 3D printers to finance the greater vision, which has proven itself several times and is currently in use in Italy.
CathRx LimitedAustraliaListedCathRx is using a novel method of assembly to produce a full range of cardiac electrophysiology and ablation catheters, and has an innovative range of devices for treating atrial fibrillation in advanced development. The new assembly method achieves unlimited electrode configurations. By separating the outer, patient-contacting electrode sheath component (which is made disposable) from the expensive inner deflection component (which is made reusable), it also introduces significant cost efficiencies to clinical procedures. Current cardiac electrophysiology and ablation catheters have at least four machined platinum ring electrodes. To achieve electrical connection, metal wires must be manually passed up the lumen of a plastic tube, through a hole in the tube and welded or crimped to the electrode. The inner deflection component is fixed inside the lumen of the tube with the conductive wires. The patented CathRx assembly method utilises a cable with all the necessary wires already coiled in its wall thickness. A laser machine is used to expose the metal of each insulated wire at strategic locations, without disturbing the adjacent wires. A novel metal coating process (electroless plating) deposits all the electrodes simultaneously. This approach enables;more automated, reproducible assembly – significantly reducing manufacturing times and costs;the production of more complex catheters than can be assembled with current techniques – eg a patented multielectrode sensing and ablation catheter for treating atrial fibrillation, designed to achieve substantially higher success rates and lower procedure times;the reuse of non-patient contacting, high-cost components – which will introduce significant cost efficiencies to health care systems. These patented technologies were developed in-house by CathRx Pty Limited, which owns all IP. Clinical trials of the initial CathRx catheter designs are beginning in early 2005. The global market for electrophysiology and ablation catheters was valued at AU$400 million in 2001. Growth to AU$1 billion is expected over the next few years as catheters for treating atrial fibrillation are released. The key markets are the USA (50%) and EU (35%). Further medical applications (eg neurological) are also planned. The metal coating technology has also been applied to prototypes for aerospace conductors and fuel cells.
RentricityUSAPrivateRentricity is a renewable energy company that generates electricity from untapped pressure in drinking water pipes. Rentricity works with municipal and industrial water facilities, helping them to generate clean, renewable electricity from an otherwise wasted resource.

results.content: Jinconn New Material | 在领英上有 34 位关注者。Jinconn New Material is one of the best manufacturers of high quality magnet in South China. | Jinconn New Material Holding Co.,Ltd was established in October, 2005 in Shenzhen then moved to Dongguan city in 2011 due to expansion requirement. In November 2016, Jinconn has successfully landed on the National Equities Exchange and ...

Jinconn New Material

Jinconn New Material Holding Co.,Ltd was established in October, 2005 in Shenzhen then moved to Dongguan city in 2011 due to expansion requirement. In November 2016, Jinconn has successfully landed on the National Equities Exchange and Quotations stock market (stock number 838939).
Company has more than 20 engineers with skillful technical background in magnet manufacturing field. Besides of that, we also hired domestic rare earth permanent magnet motor experts as independent directors to make company more competitive.
Jinconn currently has more than 700 units of inner circle cutting machines, punching machines, cutting machines, multi wire cutting machines, hole milling machines, grinding machines and other machines. we are the magnet manufacturer with the most complete production equipment, the most complete testing equipment, the most standardized software and hardware management, and the largest manufacturer in the magnet industry of the Pearl River Delta region.
The company has passed ISO9001 & 14001 in 2012 and TS16949 in 2015. We designed and developed a complete manufacturing process and quality control process and use magnetic analyzer, salt spray test, high temp test, humid test and RoHS test equipment to fulfill quality requirement.

**Bisnow is a cashless, checkless operation. Please only submit payment via credit card.
Max Capacity: Sold Out - Join DICE East May 24 & 25 in Virginia
Demand is skyrocketing for all things data centers. DICE Construction, Design & Development Series East on February 9 is officially sold out. But, don't worry, we have some good news for you...
While you still can, secure your early bird ticket to DICE East: A National Two-Day Data Center Event to be hosted in Virginia on May 24 & 25!
View the early lineup of 35+ speakers and register today here: https://www.bisnow.com/events/virginia/data-center/dice-east-a-national-two-day-data-center-event-8119
Event Host
Quantum Park
Quantum Park is a Class A, amenity-rich facility that provides today’s leading companies and government agencies maximum security, flexibility and power on a controlled 135.7 acre site situated north of the Dulles Greenway on the Loudoun County Parkway.
Quantum Park presents tenants with a unique scalable leasing opportunity with a speed-to-market capability that is not currently available on any other development site or office park. Strategically located in Loudoun County – home to the largest Internet exchange point in the world, and one of the most revered counties in the nation – Quantum Park is powering the future of enterprise in a premier setting like no other in the world.

Agenda
Why You Can't Miss This Data Center Conference
What You'll Learn At This Data Center Event:
How You'll Do More Business:
There is no slowdown in this industry. Learn about the trends, opportunities, and challenges ahead to position yourself to make the right business decisions and expand your network.
Who You’ll Network With In CRE:
Owners, providers, brokers, investors, engineers, lawyers, CEOs, vice president of design and construction, heads of acquisitions, directors of site selection, end-users, and more commercial real estate decision-makers.
Why You Should Attend:
To learn how East Coast markets are evolving to meet today's end-user and colocation data center requirements.
For questions, or interest in becoming a speaker or sponsor, please email our global director, data centers, Adam Knobloch at adam.knobloch@bisnow.com
